title: BRIEF-Fairvest Says Will Retain Primary Listing On JSE
text:
BRIEF-Fairvest Says Will Retain Primary Listing On JSE

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 08:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fairvest Says Will Retain Primary Listing On JSE Oct 24 (Reuters) - Fairvest Property Holdings Ltd : * SECONDARY LISTING ON A2X * FAIRVEST WILL RETAIN ITS PRIMARY LISTING ON JOHANNESBURG STOCK EXCHANGE * ORDINARY SHARES WILL BE TRADED ON A2X WITH EFFECT FROM 31 OCTOBER * CO'S ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL WILL BE UNAFFECTED BY SECONDARY LISTING ON A2X

BRIEF-Fairvest Says Will Retain Primary Listing On JSE
description: BRIEF-Fairvest Says Will Retain Primary Listing On JSE
